title: LG 260 L Frost Free Double Door Top Mount 3 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Dazzle Steel, GL-S292RDSX)

product_specification.Other Performance Features: Smart Inverter, Express Freezing, Works without Stabilizer, Smart Diagnosis, Smart Connect, Convertible
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor from LG
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Inverter Compressor: Built with a smart inverter linear compressor, the LG 260 Litres Frost-free Refrigerator offers high performance with minimal noise.
product_description.Multiple Airflow Direction: Offering cool air delivery through multiple vents, this refrigerator ensures uniform cooling to keep your items in the fridge fresh for long durations.

review: Best for small families and convertible for sudden requirements ! LG linear inverter compressor , tough shelves, silent function, well lighted . Go for it if not particular about absence of separate door cooling.

Super lg company product from other company product.volue of money .
Best colour best quality best desine
I like this product awesome .
And all over best
5/5
Very nice for 4 to 5 family members almost all facilities available in the refrigerator and best price for middle class families. Thanks LG & Flipkart.

I have bought dazzle steel which is convertible. If you want that very shining mirror like body, go for shiny steel (not convertible)

* Very good product
* Keeps everything really fresh
* Great value for money
* Rich premium look
* Noise is very less (actually zero noise)
* Safe delivery with good packaging
* Came for installation and demo the next day itself (if you are getting delivery in the day time sometimes installation and demo may be done the same day itself)

Totally very good buy but must consider the points below before taking a decision.

* Things to be noted:

1. I have bought Dazzle Steel which is convertible. If you want that shining mirror like look, go for Shiny Steel (not convertible), because Dazzle and Shiny has the difference like Matte and Clear.

2. This is suitable for family of 3 to maximum 4 members... Those who need more space to stuff lot of things then it is better to choose bigger size of this model (above 300L).

3. There is no dedicated tray for keeping milk. You have to keep it on fridge or should make the freezer in convertible mode and have to keep the milk on freezer (this is the main advantage of convertible mode only if you go for Dazzle Steel model)

Good product. Body and design is same as previous year's models. As of now I am not facing any issues. There were lot of complaints related to noise but I am using it for last 2 days and I am not getting any sound while the fridge is running. Overall a great purchase and timely delivery by flipkart and I got it installed the next day. Overall a very pleasant experience.

Bought the product in February, till now satisfied with the product and features. Only point like there is no light for freezer except that all are cool features. Convertible freezer also working as expected. Overall cool fridge. Power consumption bit high I think, as per my usage.

...there must be a feature/an option to shut down the either part of the fridge for a particular time period so as to save electricity. ...however overall satisfied with the product. THANKS to the whole chain/mechanism for amazingly fast delivery.
Don't buy this product, because it's coming big big sounds automatically,when the time of running it.Daily coming.
At first I was skeptical about buying it online. But it's totally worth it. It has the latest linear compressor with no noise. Working perfectly.

REVIEW AFTER 10 MONTHS. Please dont buy this fridge. I upgraded from our old lg to this one, because of the trust i had from the old fridge. but after 10 months, th fridge is not cooling properly, ice is getting builtup inside, and technicians cant findout the issue even after one week of trying. They are asking to turn off the fridge and manually defrost it. Please dont WASTE YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY on this model. you will regret it hard time, just like me. lost all the respect for the company, because for a refrigerator if it develops complaint in the warranty period itself, then the replaced parts wont live long enough and problem will return after few months. First i wasted th money by buying this fridge, and now i am going to waste more by repairing it. Learn from others mistake, save your money. thanks

Bought this item at Rs.17,500/- with no cost emi for 9 months during Diwali festive season under exchange of old Double door fridge (valued for 4000/-).
This is a convertible refrigerator with 3 star (2020) energy efficient and consumes 198 units Annually.
The best feature of this item is very silent operation. Front look is super. Sides look is average. Works with Home Inverter but I don't have it in my home now. Working nice. Further review will be posted after 3 months of usage.
Delivered the item as per the schedule by Flipkart. But With regard to Installation very very poor response from both Flipkart and LG. I installed LG App and requested for installation. But no response. They took 3 days time to install it.
In fact, we ourselves can install it but for the Damage/ Non-functional if any and warranty purpose we have to wait for the LG installation service.
Except the Installation issue, I am very much satisfied with the item and functioning.
Beautiful design and low noise very comfortable to change deep to fridge vise versa. Life is Good

We like this fridge. Because very nominal Noice while running. The fridge door not automatically closing when we pushed the door to near to fridge.our previous fridge is automatically closing when we moving the door near to the fridge cabinet. That is the only issue might be that is for our piece only not sure. Cooling effect is superb. We have choosen the starting option. Also we have placed the vegeterian items , so for our requirement this is working excellent.
The product is excellent, performance of the refrigerator is cool
Worth for money paid, functions and other factors will be reviewed after usage of the refrigerator
